Disclaimer: I am in no way a ricing expert. This guide is intended for fellow beginners confused on the very basics when it comes to the customization of their linux distro. Introduction Hi! If you are follower of r/unixporn you may have already came across various linux rice’s and know how cool they appear.
In this blog, i will try to share my experience in ricing.
If you’re not aware about the term ricing then, the phrase means to express the practice of customizing, souping-up, or making a u…

Create Empty Repository w/o readme or licences or any files, go to its screte tab and Add four secrets in the working repository USER_NAME —> github username USER_EMAIL —> github email address USER_TOKEN —> github access token USER_REPO —> working repository name follow this tutorial to add secrets—> https://www.paigeniedringhaus.com/blog/use-secret-environment-variables-in-git-hub-actions#access-the-repos-settings-tab create .github/workflows/deploy.yml in above level only-> add following line…

frontmatter.title: Auto Deploy React Website Using Github Action
